  1. Old holiday snaps: Kenya

    Jul 4, 2011

    Some photos from our trip to Kenya in Autumn 2009. Can't remember which ones were taken by me and which are Steph's, so I'll take credit for them all.

    These were taken with our old Canon Powershot, probably on Auto mode, before I knew anything about cameras and stuff. Despite that, I'm quite pleased with some of the results.

    I only like this bottom one because it looks like he's got arms.

  3. 172/365: Blondie

    Jul 4, 2011

    Really wish I could have got closer to this, but it was right in the corner of the door frame. Quite like the reflection, though.

  4. 169-171/365: Bulk

    Jul 4, 2011

    I'm experimenting with bulk photo posting for a little bit. At least now there will be a reason behind the long hiatus between posts. Besides laziness, of course.

    Properly wanted to give up on this project a few times this week.

  5. 168/365: Petrol station flowers last forever

    Jul 2, 2011

    Do lilys normally live for three weeks?
